SIGE

WSUS05 KKCI 271806 
SLCN WS 271806 
SIGMET NOVEMBER 1 VALID UNTIL 272206 
SIGMET  
WY UT CO 
FROM OCS TO 50S DVC TO 30SSW BCE TO 40WNW SLC TO OCS 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL300 AND FL380. DUE TO WNDSHR ASSOCD WITH JTST 
AND MTN WV ACT. RPTD BY ACFT. CONDS CONTG BYD 2206Z.
